taskDescription:
A contractor is building an in-ground pool. They excavate a pit that measures <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>12</mn>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>m</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mn>9</mn>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>m</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mn>2.5</mn>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>m</mtext>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">12\,{\text{m}} \times 9\,{\text{m}} \times 2.5\,{\text{m}}</annotation></semantics></math>. The dirt is being taken away in a truck that holds 30 m<sup>3</sup>. How many trips will the truck have to make to cart away all of the dirt?
